ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This recipe is paleo and a super easy way to eat your eggs! Can also top with cheese or even a slice of bread."
ins: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Place bell pepper ring in the hot skillet. Crack egg into bell pepper ring; cook until bottom holds together and corners are browned, 2 to 3 minutes. Flip and cook until desired doneness is reached, 2 to 3 minutes more; season with salt and ground black pepper.
